actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the work opportunity credit to small business employees working or living in areas of poverty.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend the work opportunity credit to wages paid to small business employees working or living in areas with a poverty rate of at least 20 percent.Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to report to specified congressional committees on the effect of such credit extension.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the work opportunity credit to small business employees working or living in areas of poverty.
